data.name: Magnus Imago  comics & animations
data.detailed_description:
There are three short comics to complete Magnus's world and atmosphere:
- Hakeldama
- Green guy
- Journey

It also includes better quality animations from the game.

After installing the DLC, the comics and animations will be in the folder "Magnus Imago DLC" under the root folder where Magnus Imago is installed.
For example, on Windows 10, this folder would typically be "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Magnus Imago".

If you are unsure where Magnus Imago is installed, navigate to Magnus Imago in the Steam library, right click and select "Properties...". Switch to the "Local files" tab in the window that pops up and press the "Browse local files..." button to open the folder
data.about_the_game:
There are three short comics to complete Magnus's world and atmosphere:
- Hakeldama
- Green guy
- Journey

It also includes better quality animations from the game.

After installing the DLC, the comics and animations will be in the folder "Magnus Imago DLC" under the root folder where Magnus Imago is installed.
For example, on Windows 10, this folder would typically be "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Magnus Imago".

If you are unsure where Magnus Imago is installed, navigate to Magnus Imago in the Steam library, right click and select "Properties...". Switch to the "Local files" tab in the window that pops up and press the "Browse local files..." button to open the folder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 or weaker
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: iGPU / GT 710 or equivalent
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 740 or equivalent
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Blood, anxiety, suicide scene, abnormal behavior
